name: test_e2e_with_logs[041_SQLI_BOOL_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_005` |
| **Name** | Double quote boolean injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `" OR "1"="1`
- **Encoded**: `%22%20OR%20%221%22%3D%221`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
